The 1Hive community covenant is a document which establishes the intention and values of the 1hive community. The community covenant has been ratified by the [[An overview of the 1Hive DAO protocol|1Hive DAO protocol]].
[[_DRAFT Revisiting the vision of the 1Hive DAO]] [[_DRAFT Community Covenant 2.0]] [[_DRAFT Why I own and operate 1Hive LLC]] [[_DRAFT 1hive.
1Hive LLC is a member of [[1Hive|the 1Hive community]]. We helped launch the [[An overview of the 1Hive DAO protocol|1hive DAO protocol]].

1Hive is a web3 community. It’s a place where people who are excited about the future of digital currencies and helping humanity successfully navigate the singularity can hang out, speculate, and learn by doing.
The 1Hive DAO is hard to explain. We’d like to start doing a better job. Therefore moving forward 1Hive LLC will be using the 1hive.
We need to update the Covenant to more clearly define the boundary of what proposals are and are not expected to be allowed within the 1Hive DAO.

1Hive is already sufficiently decentralized, so our vision may differ from the vision of other contributors. However, we believe its imperative that we all share our vision of 1Hive in order to signal our intention for the community and more effectively coordinate efforts to create value for the community.

This talks about some of the challenges of web3 contribution particularly around liability, why I own and operate 1Hive LLC to segment my web3 contributions and limit my personal liability, and how my primary business model aligns well with the goals of the 1Hive DAO.

The technological singularity will occur when technological growth becomes uncontrollable and irreversible, resulting in unforeseeable changes to human civilization. Its arguable when exactly this point happened, or will happen, but regardless the rate of technological growth appears to be accelerating exponentially.

Money is fundamentally a social construct, its is valuable because we believe it is valuable. In the past it has been difficult to establish a currency, with the most successful currencies being FIAT currencies backed by highly stable governments.

[[Exploring cause-based currencies|Holding any currency is implicitly supporting a cause]]. It is a form of collective action where individuals bet on the realization of a future where others share their values.
If you’ve got this far, and are thinking to yourself, “Wow this sounds amazing, but also a bit confusing, where do I even start?

The [[1Hive]] is made up of individuals and organizations that have contributed in various ways to advancing 1Hive’s cause. Often this simply means holding honey, participating in governance, interacting with other community members, engaging in discussion.
This is you’re invitation to join the cult of 1Hive The cult of 1Hive discord server is a community space maintained by [[1Hive LLC]].
If humanity can successfully navigate the [[A brief primer on the technological singularity|technological singularity]] we will be the beneficiaries of unimaginable utility.
For communities associated with a cryptocurrency or token, decentralization is an important factor in how the asset is likely to be regulated.
This website, along with any other communications by [[1Hive LLC]] or its representatives on other platforms are ours and ours alone.
We envision a global community that is inclusive of all of humanity, and perhaps eventually even artificially intelligent autonomous agents all working together as 1Hive.

I shouldn’t have to say this, but 1Hive is supposed to be fun! It is a place to meet people who are excited about the potential of technological progress to hang out, share ideas, collaborate on projects, and enjoy each others company.
